specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Laminated A laminated fabric is a two (or more) layer construction with a polymer film bonded to a fabric. It provides water resistance and wind-proof properties, making it suitable for rainwear, automotive, and other applications. Decoration > Foil Foil treatment, applied through print, finish, or coating techniques, adds metallic graphics or patterns to the fabric. It creates a shimmering, reflective effect.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Mechanical > Laminated The film portion is delicate, and may melt when ironed at high temperatures. Iron at low temperature and avoid direct ironing on the film. Decoration > Foil This fabric is delicate and susceptible to damage from rubbing or impact. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Water Resistant Waterproof is a specially coated fabric that prevents water penetration to a certain degree, though it may not be completely impermeable. This treatment helps protect the wearer or the item from rain and moisture, making it suitable for outerwear, bags, and outdoor gear. Recommended Use Partywear, Raincoat
